flavorText.text:
ひょろっとした　からだつき　だが
えものを　とらえるときの　うごきは
めにも　とまらないほど　すばやい。

ひとの　かおのような　ツボミから
でんせつの　マンドラゴラの　いっしゅ
ではないかと　ささやかれている。

ほそく　しなやかな　からだは　どんな　つよい
こうげきでも　しなって　よける　ことが　できる。
くちから　てつも　とかしてしまう　えきを　だす。

ほそく　しなやかな　からだは　どんな　つよい
こうげきでも　しなって　よける　ことが　できる。
くちから　てつも　とかしてしまう　えきを　だす。

おんどが　たかく　しつどの　ある
ところを　このむ。ツルを　つかって
ちいさなムシを　とらえて　たべる。

おんどが　たかく　しつどの　ある
ところを　このむ。ツルを　つかって
ちいさなムシを　とらえて　たべる。

홀쭉한 체격이지만
먹이를 잡을 때의 움직임은
눈에 보이지 않을 정도로 빠르다.

사람 얼굴 같은 봉오리 때문에
전설의 꽃 만드라고라의 일종이
아닐까 하는 소문이 돌고 있다.

가늘고 유연한 몸은 아무리 강한
공격이라도 휘어져 피할 수 있다.
입에서 철도 녹일 수 있는 액체가 나온다.

가늘고 유연한 몸은 아무리 강한
공격이라도 휘어져 피할 수 있다.
입에서 철도 녹일 수 있는 액체를 뿜는다.

온도가 높고 습기가 있는
장소를 좋아한다. 덩굴을 사용해
작은 벌레를 잡아먹는다.

온도가 높고 습기가 있는
장소를 좋아한다. 덩굴을 사용해
작은 벌레를 잡아먹는다.

喜歡高溫多濕的環境。
會利用藤蔓捕捉小蟲
當成自己的食物。

喜歡高溫多濕的環境。
會利用藤蔓捕捉小蟲
當成自己的食物。

Il préfère les climats chauds et
humides. Ses lianes peuvent
capturer une proie en un clin d’œil.

Il préfère les climats chauds et
humides. Ses lianes peuvent
capturer une proie en un clin d’œil.

Même si son corps est très frêle, ce Pokémon est
extrêmement rapide quand il attaque ses adversaires.

Son bourgeon ressemble à un visage humain.
Selon la légende, Chétiflor serait un type de
mandragore légendaire.

Le corps long et flexible de Chétiflor lui permet de se tordre
et d’osciller pour éviter tout type d’attaque, même les plus
puissantes. Ce Pokémon crache un fluide corrosif qui peut
même dissoudre le fer.

Le corps long et flexible de Chétiflor lui permet de se tordre
et d’osciller pour éviter tout type d’attaque, même les plus
puissantes. Ce Pokémon crache un fluide corrosif qui peut
même dissoudre le fer.

Il préfère les endroits chauds et humides.
Il capture les Pokémon Insecte avec ses lianes
pour les dévorer.

Il préfère les endroits chauds et humides.
Il capture les Pokémon Insecte avec ses lianes
pour les dévorer.

Obwohl sein Körper sehr schmal ist,
schnappt es blitzschnell nach Beute.

Seine Knospe ähnelt einem Menschengesicht.
Man sagt, dass es mit der legendären Mandragora
verwandt ist.

Knofensas schlanker und elastischer Körper ermöglicht es ihm,
jedem Angriff auszuweichen, so heftig dieser auch sein mag.
Dieses Pokémon spuckt eine ätzende Flüssigkeit aus,
die sogar Eisen zersetzen kann.

Knofensas schlanker und elastischer Körper ermöglicht
es ihm, jeglichem Angriff auszuweichen, so heftig dieser
auch sein mag. Dieses Pokémon spuckt eine ätzende
Flüssigkeit aus, die sogar Eisen zersetzen kann.

Knofensa bevorzugt einen warmen und feuchten
Lebensraum. Es ernährt sich von kleinen Käfer-
Pokémon, die es mit seinen Ranken fängt.

Knofensa bevorzugt einen warmen und feuchten
Lebensraum. Es ernährt sich von kleinen Käfer-
Pokémon, die es mit seinen Ranken fängt.

Aunque su cuerpo es extremadamente delgado, es
muy rápido a la hora de capturar sus presas.

Tiene cara de persona. Por el aspecto que tiene se ha
comentado que podría ser algún tipo de mandrágora
legendaria.

Bellsprout tiene un cuerpo delgado y flexible que le permite
inclinarse y balancearse para esquivar los ataques. Este
Pokémon escupe por la boca un fluido corrosivo capaz de
hacer que se derrita hasta el hierro.

Bellsprout tiene un cuerpo delgado y flexible que le permite
inclinarse y balancearse para esquivar los ataques. Este
Pokémon escupe por la boca un fluido corrosivo capaz de
hacer que se derrita hasta el hierro.

Prefiere lugares cálidos y húmedos. Atrapa
pequeños Pokémon insectos con sus lianas para
devorarlos.

Prefiere lugares cálidos y húmedos. Atrapa
pequeños Pokémon insectos con sus lianas para
devorarlos.

Sebbene abbia un corpo magrissimo, sa essere
molto rapido quando si scaglia sulla preda.

Il bocciolo somigliante a un volto umano fa ritenere
che si tratti di un leggendario esemplare di
mandragola.

Il corpo esile e flessibile di Bellsprout gli consente
di piegarsi e oscillare per evitare ogni attacco, anche
violento. Dalla bocca sputa un fluido corrosivo in grado
di sciogliere anche il ferro.

Il corpo esile e flessibile di Bellsprout gli consente
di piegarsi e oscillare per evitare ogni attacco, anche
violento. Dalla bocca sputa un fluido corrosivo in grado
di sciogliere anche il ferro.

Ama i luoghi caldi e umidi. Cattura minuscoli
Pokémon di tipo Coleottero con i suoi viticci
e poi li divora.

Ama i luoghi caldi e umidi. Cattura minuscoli
Pokémon di tipo Coleottero con i suoi viticci
e poi li divora.

A carnivorous
POKéMON that traps
and eats bugs. It uses its root
feet to soak up
needed moisture.

A carnivorous
POKéMON that traps
and eats bugs. It uses its root
feet to soak up
needed moisture.

Prefers hot and
humid places.
It ensnares tiny insects with its
vines and devours
them.

Even though its
body is extremely
skinny, it is blindingly fast
when catching its
prey.

It plants its feet
deep underground
to replenish wa­ ter. It can't es­
cape its enemy
while it's rooted.

If it notices
anything that
moves, it immediately flings
its vine at the
object.

BELLSPROUT’s thin and flexible body
lets it bend and sway to avoid any
attack, however strong it may be. From its mouth, this POKéMON spits a
corrosive fluid that melts even iron.

BELLSPROUT’s thin and flexible body
lets it bend and sway to avoid any
attack, however strong it may be. From its mouth, this POKéMON spits a
corrosive fluid that melts even iron.

A BELLSPROUT’s thin and flexible body lets
it bend and sway to avoid any attack,
however strong it may be. From its mouth,
it leaks a fluid that melts even iron.

Its bud looks like a human face. Because
of the bud, it is rumored to be a type of
legendary mandrake plant.

A carnivorous POKéMON that traps and eats
bugs. It appears to use its root feet to
replenish moisture.

It prefers hot and humid
environments. It is quick at
capturing prey with its vines.

It prefers hot and humid
environments. It is quick at
capturing prey with its vines.

It prefers hot and humid
environments. It is quick at
capturing prey with its vines.

Even though its body is extremely
skinny, it is blindingly fast
when catching its prey.

It plants its feet deep underground
to replenish water. It can’t escape
its enemy while it’s rooted.

It prefers hot and humid
environments. It is quick at
capturing prey with its vines.

It prefers hot and humid
environments. It is quick at
capturing prey with its vines.

It prefers hot and humid
environments. It is quick at
capturing prey with its vines.

It prefers hot and humid
environments. It is quick at
capturing prey with its vines.

Even though its body is extremely skinny, it is
blindingly fast when catching its prey.

Its bud looks like a human face. Because of the
bud, it is rumored to be a type of legendary
mandrake plant.

Bellsprout’s thin and flexible body lets it bend and sway to
avoid any attack, however strong it may be. From its mouth,
this Pokémon spits a corrosive fluid that melts even iron.

Bellsprout’s thin and flexible body lets it bend and sway
to avoid any attack, however strong it may be. From its mouth,
this Pokémon spits a corrosive fluid that melts even iron.

Prefers hot and humid places. It ensnares
tiny bugs with its vines and devours them.

Prefers hot and humid places. It ensnares
tiny bugs with its vines and devours them.

喜欢温度高，有一定
湿度的地方。它会用
身上的藤蔓抓小虫来吃。

喜欢温度高，有一定
湿度的地方。它会用
身上的藤蔓抓小虫来吃。
